Cryptocurrency Reference Data Manifest

Source: CoinMarketCap, Cryptocurrency Icons Project
Website: https://coinmarketcap.com/, https://github.com/spothq/cryptocurrency-icons

Data Files
----------
1. Cryptocurrencies JSON
   - Location: cryptocurrencies/cryptocurrencies.json
   - Content: Symbol to name mapping for ~12,243 cryptocurrencies
   - Format: JSON object { "BTC": "Bitcoin", "ETH": "Ethereum", ... }
   - Size: ~300 KB

2. Cryptocurrency Icons
   - Location: cryptocurrency-icons/
   - Content: 483 SVG icons for cryptocurrency symbols
   - Format: SVG files named by lowercase symbol (e.g., btc.svg, eth.svg)
   - Source: cryptocurrency-icons project (MIT License)

Generated SQL Files
-------------------
Output directory: projects/ores.sql/populate/

3. crypto_dataset_populate.sql
   - Creates dataset entries for cryptocurrency reference data

4. crypto_images_artefact_populate.sql
   - Populates dq_images_artefact_tbl with cryptocurrency icons
   - 483 SVG icons

5. crypto_currencies_large_artefact_populate.sql
   - Populates dq_currencies_artefact_tbl with all ~12,243 cryptocurrencies
   - Links to icons where available

6. crypto_currencies_small_artefact_populate.sql
   - Populates dq_currencies_artefact_tbl with top 100 cryptocurrencies
   - By market capitalization

7. crypto.sql
   - Master include file for all cryptocurrency SQL scripts

Version
-------
Data date: 2026-01-20
Icons version: Latest from cryptocurrency-icons project
